issue.title: [CF 629] spirit beast blessing not counting as mastery group
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 5.1.1.430, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

r618

Description

Minor bug but I was tweaking that shared group bar yesterday and had to put Spirit Beast Blessing in seperately as it was not counting as a Mastery buff on my hunter. Thanks for all your great work!

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 5.0.0.3 _NPCScan.Overlay - _NPCScan.Overlay 5.0.0.1 Addon Chat-Message-Hider - AddonChatMessageHider 1.10 Addon Control Panel - 3.4 Advanced Trade Skill Window - v0.10.0 Afterlife Crowd Control - Afterlife Crowd Control Answering Machine - Answering Machine v. 1.4 ArkInventory - 3.03.10 Auctioneer - AuctioneerSuite 5.11.5146 AutoRez - 4.3.1 AutoTurnIn - 3.8.1 Bartender4 - 4.5.4 Bimbo - 3.3.0.7-Release BindPad - 2.5.8 Broker uClock - v3.3.6 Broker: XPBar - Broker: XPBar v1.6 r031 Broker_Currency - 5.0.4-1.2.10 Broker_Wallet - 3.7 BuyEmAll - 3.1.1 Ceaphyrel's Auto Accept Invite - v.1.2.10 release ChatSounds - v0.4.2 Chinchilla Minimap - v2.5.7 ChocolateBar Broker Display - v2.2.6 Clique - v50001-1.0.1 Collectinator - 1.1.2 Deadly Boss Mods - 4.11.2-16-g731a0ed Deadly Boss Mods - Cataclysm mods - Cataclysm Mods r27 DragEmAll - 1.0.3 Dungeon Helper - v2.2.4 EnhancedColourPicker - b1.13623.1 Examiner - 12.08.30 Extended Vendor UI - Extended Vendor UI v1.4.8 Gnosis (Castbars and Timers) - v3.20 GoGoMount - 5.0.9 Grid2 - r684 GTFO - 4.14.1 HandyNotes - v1.2.0 iGuild - 2.0.6 Improved Stable Frame - 2.1 LiteAssist - 5.0.1 Mapster - 1.5.0 Masque - v5.0.387 Masque: Caith - v5.0.80 Masque: CleanUI - Masque: CleanUI 5.7 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.7.122 Moncai Compare - v1.5.4 MoveAnything - 13.1.0 NickAlert - NickAlert_V2012.08.28.zip OmniCC - 5.0.3 Overachiever - achievement tools and tweaks - v0.66 PassLoot - r137 pError - 30300.4-Release Postal - r369 Prat 3.0 - 3.5 QuestGuru - QuestGuru2.2.13-50001 QuestPointer - v9 QuickMark - 3.141592653589793 QuickQuestAbandon - 1.3 QuietMacros - QuietMacros.5.0.1.zip Raven - r263 ReforgedTooltip - 1.0.7 Retribution FCFS helper (clcret) - v.1.5.04.002 Shadowed Unit Frames - v3.5.8-2-gda78c6d SharedMedia - r176 Skada Damage Meter - 1.4-3 Speedy Load - 2.0.1 TellMeWhen - r618 Tidy Plates - 6.7.5 TipTac - 12.09.05 wAlign - wAlign-v1.1 XLoot - mop-3-release XLootGroup - z10-release
